New Records: Quinten Grimes matched his career high with six 3-pointers on 6-for-11 shooting
Key Match Events: The Mavs finished the first half on an 11-0 run to take a five-point lead
The Mavs reserves outscored the Lakers bench 50-25, including 38 combined points from Grimes and Jaden Hardy
Pre-Game Insights: Luka Doncic has been out with a left calf strain since Dec. 25, and Kyrie Irving has been sidelined the past two games with a bulging disk in his back
Post-Match Reflections: The Mavericks ended their losing streak without their top scorers
Los Angeles lost its second straight and for the third time in five games
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Mavericks hadn't lost six consecutive games since Jan. 23-Feb. 1, 2021
The Lakers were 11 of 35 from 3-point range and shot 45% overall from the field
Others: The Lakers start a five-game homestand against the Charlotte Hornets on Thursday
The Mavericks host the Portland Trail Blazers on Thursday
